title: Farmhand

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Stalk. You will see their role and the names of their visitor.
- At night, choose to Follow a player you've previously Stalked. You will roleblock them if they attempt to visit an Unseen player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot Follow players you've Stalked if you did not see anyone visit them.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.

desc:
Post 4703
*Off my fields! I'm always watching!*
